benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: DELETE /1.0/kb/admin/cache/tenants - Invalidates Caches per tenant level

covered: Valid deletion scenario: HTTP 204 on success (TC01)
Idempotent deletion: HTTP 204 when cache is already empty (TC09)
Not found: HTTP 404 for non-existent tenant (TC04)
Authorization: HTTP 401 for missing or invalid credentials (TC02, TC03)
Server errors: HTTP 500 for internal errors (TC05)
Bad request handling: HTTP 400 for malformed requests and invalid inputs (TC07, TC08)
Concurrency under load: HTTP 204 responses and no race conditions (TC10)
Regression coverage: previously fixed issue does not recur (TC11)
Integration with dependent services: dependent services observe cache invalidation (TC12)
State variation: partially populated cache fully invalidated (TC13)
gaps: 403 Forbidden due to insufficient admin privileges not explicitly tested
Caching headers validation (ETag / Cache-Control) not tested
Rate limiting / throttling tests not present
Observability/audit-logging checks for cache invalidation not tested
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient admin privileges
Add tests validating caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) and cache revalidation semantics
Add rate-limiting tests to ensure proper throttling under bursts
Add tests for tenant-context boundary variations and cross-tenant isolation
Add observability/audit-logging validations to verify cache invalidation events
